SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers.main

Class TrashFXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
gutek.gui.controllers.main.TrashFXMLController
@Component public class TrashFXMLController extends FXMLController
Controller for the Trash view, providing options to manage deleted decks.

The Trash view displays a list of deleted decks with options to either restore or permanently delete them.

    • updateView

      public void updateView()
      Updates the view with the list of deleted decks belonging to the currently logged-in user. It removes all existing deck cells and reloads them based on the user's deleted decks.
      Overrides:
      updateView in class FXMLController

    • removeDeckFromListView

      Removes a specific deck from the ListView, reflecting that it has been restored or permanently deleted.
      Parameters:
      deck - The deck to remove from the ListView.
